tool_description: This API is used to count how many times your website is visited by the customer. This API generates the data in json format. To take the value of visit count, you can use the visit_count key.
name: Hitcount
title: Hitcount

api_list.name: /ghitcountapi.php

required_parameters.name: wrid
required_parameters.description: Write you website registered email id in url parameter.
